Game.Comments: This game automatically creates a backup file for each save, these files are excluded to reduce archive size.

Game.Name: Dark Souls: Prepare To Die Edition
Divinity: Original Sin 2

Game.Name: Divinity: Original Sin Enhanced Edition
Game.Comments: This configuration excludes auto-saves and quick-saves due to backup size.

Game.Name: Dungeon Keeper Gold
Game.Comments: This configuration will detect and backup both the base game and Deeper Dungeons.

Game.Name: Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers 20th Anniversary Edition
God of War
Game.Comments: God of War uses a single 32 MB file to store ALL saved games. For this reason, the configuration is set to keep at least 3 different backups.

Game.Name: GreedFall
Game.Comments: This configuration excludes the "profile64" file because it includes graphical settings that are not included graphicconfig.txt.

Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun

Game.Name: Shenmue 3
Game.Comments: This game stores the autosave and the settings in the same file. This configuration includes the autosave, so most graphics settings will transfer between different PCs. Shenmue 3 saved games are NOT compatible across different store versions, even if renamed.

Game.Name: SimCity 3000 Unlimited
Game.ExcludeList: Scenarios:StarterTowns:Terrains:Berlin, Germany.sc3:Craterville.sc3:Europolis.sc3:Farmsville.sc3:Frankfurt, Germany.sc3:Liverpool, England.sc3:London, England.sc3:Madison, WI.sc3:Madrid, Spain.sc3:Moscow, Russia.sc3:Mount Herrang.sc3:Roadless Paradise.sc3:Sacramento, CA.sc3:Seoul, Korea.sc3:TUTORIAL.SC3
Game.Comments: This configuration excludes cities that are included with the game.

Game.Name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
Game.ProcessName: Sins of a Solar Empire Rebellion
Game.Path: %USERDOCUMENTS%\My Games\Ironclad Games\Sins of a Solar Empire Rebellion

Game.Name: Slay the Spire
Game.Comments: The configuration for this game may not work depending how the game is launched. Steam currently launches the Java platform directly by default, but SlayTheSpire.exe can also be used. This official configuration detects and saves based on the location of the Java platform.

Game.Name: Sleeping Dogs Definitive Edition
Game.FileType: HK Autosave Slot:HK GameSlot 1:HK GameSlot 2:HK GameSlot 3:HK GameSlot 4:HK Options

Game.Name: SnowRunner
Game.Comments: SnowRunner makes a backup copy of it's saved games each session, these extra backups are excluded in this configuration.

Game.Name: South Park: The Stick of Truth
Game.ProcessName: South Park - The Stick of Truth
Game.Path: %USERDOCUMENTS%\My Games\South Park - The Stick of Truth\save

Game.Comments: This game has anti-cheat protection that prevents GBM from accessing it's icon or any other game information.

Game.Name: Witchaven
Game.Comments: This game uses an odd folder structure different from most GOG DOSBox releases, GBM will not be able to launch it correctly using detected information. Select "run-game.bat" and "Use No Parameters" as an alternate launch configuration.
